SUBJECT: KK - congrats on partnership

Hi KK,

I saw the news about Yip's partnership - "University of Toronto and Nissan sign EV tech agreement | Chris Yip ...". Congratulations!

I'm David Ariyo, a Full Stack Developer. I recently built DAstore E-Commerce Platform - Luxury e-commerce with 140+ products, payment processing, cart management

Tech: Next.js, MongoDB, REST API, JWT | Scale: 140+ products, 7 categories

Would you be open to a brief chat if Yip ever needs freelance development support?

Best regards,
David Ariyo
Full Stack Developer
davidariyo109@gmail.com | (+234) 903-6184-863
